SimEntity.author: pjsulliv
SimEntity.name: ShipSelfDefenseForce
SimEntity.Comment:
A defense force person (originally authored to model Small Craft Attack Team (SCAT) members who man crew served weapon mounts for waterside force protection in port and underway).
This entity receives a layout of the ship from it's parent ship which is in the form of an AStarZoneMap. All entities are initially hidden (inside the ship) unless they are ordered to man their weapons. Upon receiving the order they use the map of the ship to figure out how to get to their weapons.
Once manned they will not fire until they receive the order from their ship. This communication is passed via shared events between the military ship and this entity

Parameter.name: entityDefinition
Parameter.Comment: The SMAL entity definition for this entity

Parameter.name: weaponAssignment
Parameter.Comment: The weapon location where this person is assigned (i.e. PORTBOW)

Parameter.name: responseTime
Parameter.Comment: The time it takes from the order to man the weapon to when the weapon is ready to fire

StateVariable.name: visualPerception
StateVariable.Comment: Sensor object that processes all targets in the state space before attacking

StateVariable.name: waypointCreator
StateVariable.Comment: The utility that creates waypoints based on the arguments passed

StateVariable.name: targetQueue
StateVariable.Comment: The queue of active targets for this entity

StateVariable.name: tacticalMode
StateVariable.Comment: The current tactical mode of this entity

StateVariable.name: calc
StateVariable.Comment: A utility class that performs 3D vector math calculations

StateVariable.name: layout
StateVariable.Comment: A map of the environment that contains the collection of search nodes for path finding

StateVariable.name: aStarSearch
StateVariable.Comment: The A* search implementation that is used for path finding

StateVariable.name: startZone
StateVariable.Comment: The zone from which the terrorist should start

StateVariable.name: goalZone
StateVariable.Comment: The area where this terrorist should head towards to execute it's tactics

StateVariable.name: zoneMoverManager
StateVariable.Comment: The primary mover for this entity, moves using A* search zone geometry

StateVariable.name: patrolStartWaypoint
StateVariable.Comment: The waypoint selected to start the next leg of the patrol

StateVariable.name: speedScalar
StateVariable.Comment: The default speed scale for this entity

StateVariable.name: timeToManWeapon
StateVariable.Comment: [DATA] The time it takes to man this weapon

StateVariable.name: mannedAndReady
StateVariable.Comment: True when this weapon is manned and ready, required for the weapon to be shot

StateVariable.name: batteriesReleased
StateVariable.Comment: Whether this entity has batteries release and can shoot at a hostile contact

StateVariable.name: hostile
StateVariable.Comment: The target that this entity should shoot at

Event.name: Run
Event.Comment: Represents the reseting features and initial events for this entity. State variables are reset to the desired state at the start of each simulation run

Event.name: SecurityAlert
Event.Comment: Represents the passing of Security alert which prompts this agent to man it's weapon station

Argument.name: contact
Argument.Comment: The contact that caused the security alert

Event.name: Fire
Event.Comment: Marks when this entity starts shooting at the contact

Argument.name: target
Argument.Comment: The mover that this entity is shooting at

Event.name: BatteriesReleased
Event.Comment: Passes the authority to shoot at a contact as determined by the parent unit

Argument.name: contact
Argument.Comment: The contact who is the desired target

LocalVariable.name: haveTargetVisual
LocalVariable.Comment: Whether or not this target is in visual range
